meta.name: Send WhatsApp Notifications for Cal.com & Calendly Bookings using Google Gemini

parameters.content:
## üìÖ Calendar Booking Notifications to WhatsApp

**What this workflow does:**
- Monitors booking events from both Cal.com and Calendly
- Automatically generates formatted WhatsApp messages for booking updates
- Sends instant notifications to the meeting host

**Supported Events:**
- ‚úÖ New Bookings
- üîÑ Rescheduled Meetings 
- ‚ùå Cancelled Bookings
- üèÅ Meeting Ended (Cal.com only)

**Features:**
- Smart message formatting with WhatsApp markdown
- Emoji-enhanced notifications
- Guest details and meeting information
- Timezone-aware time display
- Memory for context awareness

**Setup Required:**
1. Connect your Cal.com/Calendly accounts
2. Configure WhatsApp Business API credentials
3. Update recipient phone number in WhatsApp node
4. Test with sample bookings

üí° **Pro Tip:** Customize the message templates in the AI Agent node to match your brand voice!
